name: There's this robot chick, she wants pizza. How may I help?
name_original: There's this robot chick, she wants pizza. How may I help?
description:
I'm just going along my merry way when I hear the desperate cries of someone who needs help. Well I couldn't just ignore the pleas! In front of me, a very cute robot. Who that makes me blush quite hard. The problem? Pizza It turns out robots can't navigate Captchas too well. Which might be the point.

Will I decide to help her get her pizza (and share it), or will I just ignore her?  Well that's completely up to you!

There's a Chick Robot, she Wants Pizza, was written, "programmed", compiled, and made in a rainy November morning, both as an attempt at nano, and as therapy. I hope you enjoy it, and if you do, why not leave some feedback?
